nodes.text: The Gen Con Game Fair is one of the largest and most prominent gaming conventions in North America. Various Star Wars products and events have been held at these conventions.

At Gen Con Game Fair 2001, the Living Force campaign released the Broken Orbits trilogy as well as the interactive Blown Away. At Gen Con Game Fair 2008, the RPGA adventure The Betrayal of Darth Revan was released. At Gen Con Game Fair 2014, the beta sourcebook scenario for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Force and Destiny, "Lost Legacies", was released. FFG also ran the games for the mini adventures Unwelcome Arrival and Begun, The Clone Wars Have! in later years.
